page.title: 15Domestic Pets
page.content: In our class 24 children keep pets,7 do not.Some of them have more than one kind of pet.The pets children have are as follows: rabbits, hamsters, guinea pigs, horses, dogs, cats, birds and fish.{Fish-}7 people have goldfish-3 keep their goldfish in tanks, 3 keep their fish in bowls, 1 keeps her fish in a pond. Dean Stokes has a horse that he keeps in a field at Matson. Anthony Perrill has a grass snake. Nicola King has 2 rabbits. She keeps them in separate huts because they fight. She feeds them on lettuce, cabbage, rabbit food, grass and carrots. She cleans them out once a week. She puts sawdust on the floor of the hut and gives them water. Their names are Mitzy and Fritzy. Fritzy is black and white and Mitzy is just brown.
